article.title: AeroVironment to Support Raven Gimbal
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: AeroVironment Incorporated, Monrovia, California, was awarded a $6,820,125 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract. The award will provide for the modification of an existing contract to procure support services for the Raven gimbal. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
